title: Bug 121170: get column label from metadata object should return user recognizable strings
OB: When calling IMetaData.getColumnLabel() before data extraction, the method does not return user recognizable strings.
EB: The method IMetaData.getColumnLabel() should return user recognizable strings regardless of whether data extraction has been performed or not.
SR:
To reproduce: 
 1. Call IMetaData.getColumnLabel() before performing any data extraction. 
 2. Compare the returned value with the expected user recognizable string.
